p: SARS-CoV-2 causes severe acute respiratory syndrome and leads to diverse complications, being especially dangerous for people with different comorbidities. Starting from the end of January, COronaVIrus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) has spread all over the world and become a source of fear and sorrow for millions of people. The investigation of the interaction of SARS-CoV-2 with the human body is essential because such information will contribute to the development of effective therapeutic approaches.
